Posted By: ZEvilMustache (2/2/2010 5:39:01 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
So let's see, for 5 mana you could get [a 4/4 flier with vigilance!](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=193767)  
OR  
  
You could get a 3/3 non-flier that (wait for it...) can become 5/3 if your opponent happens to be playing black, and happens to block it with one of his black creatures!  
  
Gee, tough call...  
  
Gets a half-point for counting as a Cleric, and being reasonably big...even a vanilla 3/3 could swing for damage in the right circumstances. There's just WAY better white creatures out there. 1.0/5
